title: Inconsistent default value
body_html:
In this doc:

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/assign

the default value for validate_shape and use_locking is different between the method signature and the explanation below it.

assign(
    ref,
    value,
    validate_shape=None,
    use_locking=None,
    name=None
)

vs.

validate_shape: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
use_locking: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
body_text:
In this doc:

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/assign

the default value for validate_shape and use_locking is different between the method signature and the explanation below it.
assign(
    ref,
    value,
    validate_shape=None,
    use_locking=None,
    name=None
)

vs.
validate_shape: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
use_locking: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
body:
In this doc:

> https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/assign

the default value for `validate_shape` and `use_locking` is different between the method signature and the explanation below it.

```
assign(
    ref,
    value,
    validate_shape=None,
    use_locking=None,
    name=None
)
```

vs. 

```
validate_shape: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
use_locking: An optional bool. Defaults to True. ...
```
